gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 104, Nets 91
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeat the Nets, 104-91. Zion Williamson led the way with 28 points, seven rebounds and four assists for the Pelicans in the victory, while Cam Thomas tallied 25 points for the Nets in the losing effort. The Pelicans improve to 42-26 on the season, while the Nets fall to 26-43.
